subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: By capitalizing on Juan Pablo Montoya’s collapse, Jamie McMurray became the third driver to win the Daytona 500 and the Brickyard 400 in one year.
snippet: By capitalizing on Juan Pablo Montoya’s collapse, Jamie McMurray became the third driver to win the Daytona 500 and the Brickyard 400 in one year.
